name: hello-world-example
description: Sample programs to demonstrate how to develop smart contract for Aptos blockchain
author: Tung Nguyen

scripts.deploy:hello_world: aptos account fund-with-faucet --profile local --account local --amount 1000000 && aptos move publish --profile local --package-dir ./hello_world_example/contracts --sender-account local --assume-yes
scripts.deploy:fungible_token: aptos account fund-with-faucet --profile local --account local --amount 1000000 && aptos move publish --profile local --package-dir ./fungible_token_example/contracts --sender-account local --assume-yes
scripts.deploy:merkle_tree: aptos account fund-with-faucet --profile local --account local --amount 1000000 && aptos move publish --profile local --package-dir ./merkle_tree_example/contracts --sender-account local --assume-yes
